sentences.sentence: It was so new and big and wonderful and such a heavenly color.
sentences.translation: 它是那样清新、那样辽阔，美好得仿佛天堂的色彩。

sentences.sentence: There are other heavenly bodies out there besides the moon and stars.
sentences.translation: 除了月亮和星星外，那里还有其他天体。

sentences.sentence: Sichuan has always enjoyed the reputation of being a "Heavenly Land of Plenty".
sentences.translation: 四川向有天府之国的美称。
